segments.text: It says here that you graduated from Beijing Normal University with a major in English Language and Literature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Then you may think that I am not fit for this job according to my educational background .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I want to be a tour guide very much because I like traveling and meeting various kinds of people . So I took an evening course at the Tourism School of Beijing after graduation and I have gotten a qualification certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you must be an extravert ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I always enjoy being with a group of people and chatting with them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think are the responsibilities of a tourist guide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A tourist guide must be responsible for arranging and coordinating tour activities , and offering service of transportation , accommodation , sightseeing , shopping and entertainment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't you consider it a hard work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you any experience as a tourist guide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I usually guided foreign tourists around Beijing when I was in University .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever learned any other foreign languages other than English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have learned a little French and Japanese as well .
segments.speaker: S2
